Publik Famille Demo Documentation
=================================

Welcome to the developer documentation for **Publik Famille Demo**.
This project is a Django-based demonstration portal for managing
families, activities, billing, documents, and monitoring.

Contents
--------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Project Overview

   overview
   installation
   usage

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Applications

   activities/index
   billing/index
   families/index
   documents/index
   monitoring/index

   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Project Core

   publik_famille_demo/index
